mapper.select: SELECT s.name AS s_name, b.id, b.cus_no, b.prod_no, b.bname, b.title, b.content, b.write_date, b.additional_images, b.type, b.status, b.is_private, r.content AS r_content, r.write_date AS r_write_date, c.cus_id AS c_cus_id FROM board b LEFT JOIN reply r ON b.id = r.board_no LEFT JOIN seller s ON r.seller_no = s.id LEFT JOIN customer c ON b.cus_no = c.id WHERE b.cus_no = #{cus_no} AND b.is_del = 0 AND (r.is_del = 0 OR r.is_del IS NULL) AND b.bname = 'question' ORDER BY b.write_date DESC

SELECT s.name AS s_name, b.id, b.cus_no, b.prod_no, b.bname, b.title, b.content, b.write_date, b.additional_images, r.content AS r_content, r.write_date AS r_write_date FROM board b LEFT JOIN reply r ON b.id = r.board_no LEFT JOIN seller s ON r.seller_no = s.id WHERE b.is_del = 0 AND b.cus_no = #{cus_no} AND (r.is_del = 0 OR r.is_del IS NULL) AND b.bname = 'question'
AND b.status = 1
AND b.status = 2
AND b.status = 3
AND b.write_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY b.write_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(cus_no, prod_no, bname, title, content, write_date, type, status, is_del, is_private) VALUES(#{cus_no}, #{prod_no}, 'question', #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), #{type}, 1, 0, #{is_private})
